xmlDump.sql: SELECT tits.publication_id as id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT persons.last_name, ', ', persons.first_name ORDER BY persons.last_name SEPARATOR ' ') as creator, tits.title as title, tits.year as pub_date, tits.keywords as subject FROM (SELECT publications.*, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT keywords.name ORDER BY keywords.name SEPARATOR '###') as keywords FROM publications, articles_publications, articles_keywords, keywords WHERE articles_publications.publication_id = publications.publication_id AND articles_keywords.article_id = articles_publications.article_id AND articles_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id GROUP BY publications.publication_id ) as tits, articles_publications, articles_persons, persons WHERE articles_publications.publication_id = tits.publication_id AND articles_publications.article_id = articles_persons.article_id AND articles_persons.person_id = persons.person_id GROUP BY tits.publication_id

collection.name: Alexander von Humboldt Forschungsstelle: Die unselbständigen Schriften Alexander von Humboldts
